title: Determine direction of velocity after two forces

content.question: Which of the following vectors could represent the velocity of the object at the end of 3 s, assuming the scales on the x and y axes are equal?

choices.label: Choice A has an arrow pointing to the right along the x-axis.
Choice B has an arrow pointing up and to the right at an angle less than 45 degrees above the x-axis.
Choice C has an arrow pointing up and to the right at an angle of 45 degrees above the x-axis.
Choice D has an arrow pointing up and to the right at an angle greater than 45 degrees above the x-axis.
Choice E has an arrow pointing up along the y-axis.

content.answer: Choice C has an arrow pointing up and to the right at an angle of 45 degrees above the x-axis.

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
